reviews.name: Post-It Wall Easel with Hanger, Plastic, Smoke, 2pk
reviews.reviewText: Really practical when you're not home often with your husband!
reviews.title: 21 August 2011

reviews.name: Post-It Wall Easel with Hanger, Plastic, Smoke, 2pk
reviews.reviewText: Im a girl scout leader and it is great to have it to write when we are work on try-its. The girls enjoy writing on it and learning with it. It a east clean up when finished. The price is great. I like using it and telling people about it.
reviews.title: 26 October 2010

reviews.name: Post-It Wall Easel with Hanger, Plastic, Smoke, 2pk
reviews.reviewText: i really do like all of your prducts i have them all they are very helpful in an handy in all ways .
reviews.title: awesome

reviews.name: Post-It Wall Easel with Hanger, Plastic, Smoke, 2pk
reviews.reviewText: Love to use Post-it easel pads, but in small rooms where there is no room for an easel stand, I've used something else for note taking. With this product, I'll be using easel pads from now on...I can hang this on a wall and take notes easily. Also comes in handy in my office - now I have a place to store my back-up pads.
reviews.title: Great for Small Meeting Spaces

reviews.name: Post-It Wall Easel with Hanger, Plastic, Smoke, 2pk
reviews.reviewText: This product is the BEST. I am a Guidance Counselor it's fabulous for small group counseling. It's always on my wish list. I use several post-it wall easels through-out the school year. The students have a visual aid and are engaged in the activity.
reviews.title: Post it Wall Easel
